LanguageData.COAA_defaultSearchIngredientRadiusSettin: New bills will be created with this radius.
LanguageData.COAA_denyDistantSupplyJobsSetting_descri: Do not supply directly from a resource if hauling it to storage would bring it closer to the given blueprint. (Recommended with Pick Up And Haul since only haul jobs utilize inventory.)
LanguageData.COAA_countableMeatRecipesSetting_descrip: These butcher recipes are able to count their respective meat type.
LanguageData.COAA_convenientButcherRecipesSetting_des: 'Butcher small creature' yields <= 75 meat to conserve freezer space.
LanguageData.COAA_separateCannibalMealsSetting_descri: Separate cannibal meals to avoid ingredient mixing (meals vanish if mod is unloaded).
LanguageData.COAA_separateInsectMealsSetting_descript: Separate insect meals to avoid ingredient mixing (meals vanish if mod is unloaded).
LanguageData.COAA_scrollRestrictPawnsSetting_descript: Shift + scroll wheel on area restrictions will cycle them for all listed pawns (colonist or animal).
LanguageData.COAA_betterPawnControl_BirthSetting_titl: Patch Better Pawn Control for animal birth
LanguageData.COAA_betterPawnControl_BirthSetting_desc: Hatched and birthed animals will inherit the entire restriction policy of their parent.
